以轻应用的方式集成于workplus系统，门户系统无独立用户
客户端与管理后台的接口
轻应用管理划分门户系统的管理权限、
通过workplus的pc客户端或管理后台登陆
门户系统是，连接各第三方系统做内容管理，展示了一个门户
门户系统轻应用的管理员

./.title: 简介
./.body:
粤海门户系统
以轻应用的方式集成于workplus系统，门户系统无独立用户
通过workplus的PC客户端或管理后台登陆
由于workplus管理后台-轻应用管理划分门户系统的管理权限、
门户系统是，连接各第三方系统做内容管理，展示了一个门户

api.html.title: API
api.html.body:
API
客户端与管理后台的接口

session.html.title: 登陆
session.html.body:
登陆
  url: /session
  method: POST
  headers:
  {
    from: "admin" //当登陆管理后台时，用户必须是workplus-门户系统轻应用的管理员
    //客户端使用client
  }

  body:
{//客户端或其它方式获取到的信息
  "ticket": "",
  "userId": "",
  "orgId": "",
  "domainId": ""
}

result:
{
  "status": "ok",
  "msg": "operation success",
  "results": {
      "_id": "59ae49ce6f0b9dfd1d20bb5c",
      "__v": 0,
      "isAdmin": true, //是否是管理员
      "position": "测试",
      "avatar": null,//头像mediaId
      "pinyin": "lihao",
      "name": "李浩",
      "domainId": "atwork",
      "orgId": "10d71e67-3cdb-4866-b232-185e414de67c",
      "userId": "07b64ad30b91469cac0a7079e75f4385",
  }
}

theme.html.title: 主题管理

block.html.title: 模块管理

role.html.title: 角色管理
role.html.body:
角色管理
仅workplus管理员可用


查询当前系统角色
修改当前系统角色

查询当前系统角色
  url: /role
  method: GET
result:
{
    "status": "ok",
    "msg": "operation success",
    "results": {
        "_id": "5ae2dc23354ebb19d2ddf758",
        "__v": 0,
        "role": {
            "custom": [//自定义角色
                {
                    "_id": "5b04d0b482e98ee1138a8ddc",//标识
                    "employees": [],
                    "departments": [],
                    "name": "党建"
                }
            ],
            "default": [//默认角色
                {
                    "_id": "5ae2dc0b73fc4860e49ee7aa",
                    "employees": [
                        {
                            "id": 149,
                            "orgId": "10d71e67-3cdb-4866-b232-185e414de67c",
                            "name": "嘎嘎嘎",
                            "nickname": "嘎嘎嘎=^\\",
                            "domainId": "atwork",
                            "userId": "fb9e6a05e93c4d19bb9b5087e7c49e4a",
                            "avatar": "Z3JvdXAxL00wMC8wMC8xMS9yQkFDLUZkdzMtZUFYLThhQUFEeGdYWjlmMjgyMzUuanBn",
                            "type": "EMPLOYEE",
                            "positions": [
                                {
                                    "employee_id": 149,
                                    "org_id": 11413,
                                    "org_name": "测试部",
                                    "corp_id": 71,
                                    "corp_name": "大红包",
                                    "job_title": "领导",
                                    "path": "/71/11411/11413/",
                                    "type": "DEPT",
                                    "primary": true,
                                    "chief": false
                                }
                            ],
                            "pinyin": "gagaga",
                            "initial": "ggg",
                            "username": "15992470693"
                        }
                    ],
                    "departments": [],
                    "name": "领导"
                },
                {
                    "_id": "5ae2dc0b73fc4860e49ee7ab",
                    "employees": [],
                    "departments": [],
                    "name": "员工"
                }
            ]
        },
        "domainId": "xxx",
        "userId": "xxx",
        "orgId": "xxx"
    }
}

修改当前系统角色
  url: /role/:id
  method: PUT
  body:

  {
        "custom": [
            {
                "employees": [],
                "departments": [],
                "name": "党建"
            }
        ],
        "default": [ //不可添加新的默认角色
            {
                "employees": [
                    {
                        "id": 149,
                        "orgId": "10d71e67-3cdb-4866-b232-185e414de67c",
                        "name": "嘎嘎嘎",
                        "nickname": "嘎嘎嘎=^\\",
                        "domainId": "atwork",
                        "userId": "fb9e6a05e93c4d19bb9b5087e7c49e4a",
                        "avatar": "Z3JvdXAxL00wMC8wMC8xMS9yQkFDLUZkdzMtZUFYLThhQUFEeGdYWjlmMjgyMzUuanBn",
                        "type": "EMPLOYEE",
                        "positions": [
                            {
                                "employee_id": 149,
                                "org_id": 11413,
                                "org_name": "测试部",
                                "corp_id": 71,
                                "corp_name": "大红包",
                                "job_title": "领导",
                                "path": "/71/11411/11413/",
                                "type": "DEPT",
                                "primary": true,
                                "chief": false
                            }
                        ],
                        "pinyin": "gagaga",
                        "initial": "ggg",
                        "username": "15992470693"
                    }
                ],
                "departments": [],
                "name": "领导"
            },
            {
                "employees": [],
                "departments": [],
                "name": "员工"
            }
        ]
    }

workplus-org.html.title: 用户与组织信息
workplus-org.html.body:
组织树

根据orgId获取部门信息
查找雇员信息

根据orgId获取部门信息
*传入pathId则查询子部门或者子组织
*不传入pathId,则查询的是根组织
url: "/organizations?pathId=1234"
method: GET
results:
{
  "status": "ok",
    "msg": "operation success",
    "results": [//只例出部分数据
            {
                "domain_id": "atwork",

查找雇员信息
*keyword 可以是名称，username等.
url: /users/search?keyword=lihao
method: GET
results:
{
  "status": "ok",
   "msg": "operation success",
   "results": []
}

images.html.title: 图片
images.html.body:
上传与获取图片

上传图片
下载图片

上传图片
url: /images
method: POST
file字段
result:
{
    "status": "ok",
    "msg": "operation success",
    "results": {
        "mediaId":"Z3JvdXAxL00wMC8wNi83Ri9yQkFDLUZuY09jMkFLc3FDQUFPcWV3TEQ3ZlEyMzQuanBn"
    }
}

下载图片
url: /images/:mediaId
method: GET
